content:
As Lorelei rushes toward Jacob, her hold on him slipping away, Racita quickly shields him with her own energy. With a fierce determination in her eyes, she holds out her hand and sends a wave of energy towards Lorelei, repelling the evil spirit with a burst of light.

"Get back!" Racita shouted, her voice filled with authority.

Lorelei stumbled back, her expression a mixture of anger and surprise.

"How dare you!" she growled, gathering herself for another attack.

But Racita was ready for her, her energy crackling and swirling around her as she stood guard over Jacob.

"I won't let you hurt him anymore," Racita declared, her voice ringing with a fierce determination.

Eri appeared at her side, also ready to defend Jacob. The two spirits stood united against Lorelei, their combined energy forming a powerful barrier between them and the evil spirit.

Jacob watched, awestruck, as Racita and Eri stood their ground against the relentless attacks of Lorelei. He felt a surge of gratitude towards the two spirits, grateful for their bravery and their willingness to protect him.

"Thank you," he whispered, his voice barely audible over the sounds of the battle.

Racita and Eri continued to stand their ground, their energy glowing bright in the darkness of the void as they fought to protect Jacob and vanquish Lorelei once and for all.
